segments.text: I see water flowing over the edge of the sink, creating a small puddle that spreads across the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman appears so focused, polishing a plate, completely oblivious to the mess around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but wonder how she can ignore such chaos right at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sunlight coming through the window makes it all seem even more surreal, almost like a painting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The two children are behaving so mischievously, and I can't help but feel a twinge of fear for what might happen next.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching precariously, trying to reach those cookies in that jar, and that stool doesn’t look safe at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the girl beside him, her arm raised in anticipation, almost like she's plotting something.
segments.speaker: PAR
